record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 23, 2008, AT 3 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 23, 2008, AT 3 P.M. -- (Senate - June 20, 2008)

[Page: S5947]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, seeing no one else on the floor, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:49 p.m., adjourned until Monday, June 23, 2008, at 3 p.m.
